Class Beverage

java.lang.Object
com.example.model.MenuItem
com.example.model.Beverage
public class Beverage extends MenuItem
Represents a beverage menu item with size and flavor options. The price is determined by the size of the beverage.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final double
    LARGE_PRICE
    Price for large size beverage.

    MEDIUM_PRICE

    Price for small size beverage.

  • Constructor Details

    • Beverage

      public Beverage(Size size, Flavor flavor, int quantity)
      Constructs a new Beverage with specified size, flavor and quantity.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the beverage (SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE)
      flavor - the flavor of the beverage
      quantity - the number of beverages ordered

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates the total price based on beverage size and quantity.
      Specified by:
      price in class MenuItem
      Returns:
      total price for the beverage order

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the beverage. Format: "[flavor], [size] [formatted price][quantity]"
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string with flavor, size, price and quantity

    • getIngredients

      public String getIngredients()
      Returns a string listing the beverage's flavor and size. Format: "[flavor], [size]"
      Returns:
      formatted string with flavor and size
